data.caption: Clarification Regarding Price Movement
data.news_body: Clarification  regarding price movement.

data.caption: Clarification sought from Delta Manufacturing Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Delta Manufacturing Ltd on September 12, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
